attributes.action: Get UK people home from Australia before the Virus spreads any more.
attributes.additional_details: My Daughter and her friend is stuck in Australia, we have looked all over the internet from all cities in Australia to all cities in the UK the only flight that i found was over £14,000, There was 6 of us spending over 2 hours looking for a way to get them home, with No luck. Please Please Please can we just get both of them and all the British people back home before this horrible virus spreads any further.
attributes.background: Daughter is stuck in Australia and can not get home, Can we just get them home before the Virus spreads any further.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307260

Since you started your petition the Government has announced a new government partnership with airlines to fly back more tourists stranded abroad: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/new-government-partnership-with-airlines-to-fly-back-more-tourists-stranded-abroad

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
